title: Coronavirus: BBC boss tells staff he is suspending plans to cut news jobs to provide virus coverage
description: 'We've got to get on with doing the job that you're doing really brilliantly,' says Lord Hall
content:
BBC boss Tony Hall has told employees he is suspending plans to axe 450 jobs across BBC News because of the demands involved in covering the coronavirus outbreak.
A BBC spokeswoman confirmed its director-general had told staff job cuts were now on hold force… [+2000 chars]
